direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve loan-related operations (borrowing and repaying) with similar parameter handling and request structures.
Both methods involve loan-related operations (borrowing and renewing) with similar parameter handling and request structures.
Both methods access loan-related data, although one is for borrowing and the other for querying ongoing orders.
Both methods access loan-related data, although one is for borrowing and the other for querying repayment history.
Both methods access collateral-related data, although one is for borrowing and the other for querying collateral account details.
The borrow method depends on the availability of loanable assets, which is queried by the loanableAssets method.
The borrow method depends on the availability of collateral assets, which is queried by the collateralAsset method.
The borrow method depends on the interest rates, which are queried by the borrowInterestRate method.
